PageTitle: peer(VPN instance MSDP view/MSDP view of a public network instance)
FuncDef:
The peer connect-interface command configures a Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) peer.
The undo peer connect-interface command restores the default setting. The peer connect-interface command configures a Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) peer. The undo peer connect-interface command restores the default setting. By default, no MSDP peers are configured.
ParentView: VPN instance MSDP view,MSDP view of a public network instance

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the address of a remote MSDP peer.
The address is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the type and number of an interface. The local router uses the primary address of the interface as the source IP address to set up a TCP connection with the remote MSDP peer.
-

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
To set up an MSDP peer relationship and a TCP connection between peers, run the peer connect-interface command.
Running the peer connect-interface command is the prerequisites for you to run other peer commands.
